title: install: installer should setup $GOPATH
body:
by **jwfearn**: 
After installing go with the OS X installer, I tried:

`go get github.com/ericchiang/pup`

it failed:

package github.com/ericchiang/pup: cannot download, $GOPATH not set. For more details
see: go help gopath

The help text was TL;DR

An important reason for having an installer is to free the user from manual setup. 
Please consider changes such that a post-installer Go installation is useable as-is.
